author: Yoko Kubota
title: Didi Partially Suspends Ride-Hailing Service After Passenger Death
text:
BEIJINGâ€”Ride-hailing giant Didi Chuxing said Friday it will suspend one of its services for a week amid widening public outrage over the death of a passenger.
The action came after a 21-year-old woman who booked a ride through Didi was killed in the central Chinese city of Zhengzhou on May 6, according to police. Police say they are seeking a 27-year-old suspect who was captured on surveillance footage abandoning the car.
